Client has terminal illness and short prognosis. Due to his medical condition, he will be increasingly bed bound and hence requires a air pressure mattress (second hand). 
Client is in financial need as he has been unemployed for several years and savings have been depleting. Family is not contributing to his medical related expenses. 
Details of air mattress:
- max weight capacity 120kg

Kindly contact me at my work mobile at 84282545.

requests.name: Adult Bicycle + 2x children bicycles with training wheels

She is front-line worker in a hospital, and has little time to spend with her children due to her job responsibilities. 4 of her children who are under 7 years old have voiced out that they want to learn cycling, and she would like to bring them out to learn cycling as a family bonding activity. She currently do not own any bicycles of her own, and hence would like to request for one adult bicycle of her own, and at least 2 children bicycle with training wheels for her children to share.

offers.name: King James Bible
offers.description:
Through Brothers and Sisters in Christ who provided precious prayer support, sourced for Bibles and supplied funds, praise be to God alone, we have some King James Bibles to give away to any ministry or non-profit who uses or shares the Word of God, the King James version, in their work with people.

We do not charge for the Bible and only ask that you do not sell it.

If you are wondering why we are giving out these Bibles freely, it is because of the great love God has shown us through the precious blood of the Lord Jesus Christ. We have also been richly blessed by people who gave us Bibles when we could not find them ourselves.

These King James Bibles are not facsimiles of the 1611, but are still true KJVs. They are also brand new.

All glory be to God and Him alone!
